column4: Can anyone tell me exactly what to do for this error? 'You do not have the permissions necessary to view the contents of "ircd-hybrid".'?
looks like a permission error?
I was just linked to that.. But there were tooooo many to choose from. How do I do it exactly? Sorry, I'm a noob
Can you show me the line for whatever you're trying to look at from "ls -l"?
Do you know what you're doing, or do you need help?
Huh? Sorry, I am a REAL big noob
ok, you just have to let me know you need help :)
do you have a terminal open?
Yes I do
ok, what is the full path to what you're trying to see? You want to do "cd /path/to/whatever"
I am in the /etc folder trying to view a folder inside of it
remind me what the name of it is? something about ircd?
it is the path: /etc/ircd-hybrid and it says You do not have the permissions necessary to view the contents of "ircd-hybrid".
ok, can you paste for me the output of "ls -l | grep ircd-hybrid"?
In a terminal correct?
I did that and it did nothing it just started a new clean line
k, just do "ls -l" and pastebin it for me?
OK one sec
http://www.pastebin.com/m16b3256b
There's no post there?
eggenz7: Sorry guys, I gotta run for a bit (1/2 hour?) I'm sure someone else here will be able to help you, but if not, feel free to ping me later
